name: Rompefobias
description:
The game consist of 2 minigames puzzles:

Nictofobia is about looking for light sources before your own light extinguishes. if a enemies hits you, you will lose some of your light. If you find light sources, the intensity of your light increases. Move around using the four directional arrows on the keyboard.

Claustrofobia is about avoiding obstacles and getting powerups, while the walls sourounding you get closer to each other within time, every obstacle you hit leaves you with even less space to manouver. If you get a powerup, you will gain more distance between the walls, you must find the right key for each door in and exit the 3 different coloured rooms. Move up and down using the directional arrow on the keyboard.

Enjoy and have fun! :)
